title: Sell my Stock Wheels?; Rapide vs Karma; Cars we Miss; Pikes Peak Plan - TST Podcast #737
description:
How do we remain objective when reviewing/buying cars; who we're excited to see at PPIHC 2022; should you sell stock wheels?; cars we regret selling; and an interview with the CEO of Aston Martin NA and Andy Priaulx, the racing driver in charge of the Valkyrie program. All that and more!

Recorded June 20, 2022 

 

Go to blackvue.com/TST and use the promo code TIRE to get 10% off of any BlackVue dash cam. Free shipping for orders over $200.
 

Sign up today at butcherbox.com/TIRE and use code TIRE to get 1 pack of free bacon in EVERY box for the life of your membership PLUS $10 off your first order.
 

Visit SoFi.com/TIRE to learn how you can win up to $1,000 in stock when you open an account.

 

Want your question answered? Want to watch the live stream, get ad-free podcasts, or exclusive podcasts? Join our Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/thesmokingtirepodcast

author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
